Source code for Playground.my_utils.staff.annotate_

[docs]def annotate(label):
    def decorate(func):
        func.label = label
        return func

    return decorate



if __name__ == '__main__':
    @annotate("Test label")
    def spam(a, b):
        return a + b


    print(spam(1, 2), spam.label)
